text: Di madagoaa hua digau Israel ala nogo noho i baahi adu gi di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Jezreel gu longono bolo digau dauwa o Israel guu llele, gei Saul mo ana dama daane dogodolu la guu mmade, gei digaula gu diiagi nadau waahale guu llele gi daha. Nomuli gei digau Philistia ga lloomoi gaa noho i nia waahale aalaa.
